description: Creates an AWS Firewall Manager resource set.

ResourceType.markdownDescription:
An AWS resource type

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^([^\s]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

A Base62 ID

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 22  
Maximum Length: 22  
Pattern: ^([a-z0-9A-Z]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption
